TopicTitle: Simple exploit to get free funds with strategies

Articles.Content:
I just discovered that you get free funds if you pick "agressive negotiations" and recover vessels from the launch pad. You paid the reduced costs but get the full funds back. It may not seem that much at first but if you are running bigger missions the advantage gets massive. I dislike this especially on hard mode, because it is an exploit I can only avoid by not using agressive negotiations and I kinda like the concept Of course I know that it still costs some rep, but if you get thousands of funds back it's not that relevant anymore. Correct me if I am missing something here, but I think a fix is needed

Edited October 13, 2014 by Claw
bug tag

This should probably be filed as a bug report. I'll move it to the Support sections.

Could you pull together a concise set of reproduction steps, just to ensure that it can be reproduced easily?

Might be an idea to grab a few relevant screenshots (of craft cost v.s. recovery amount, for example) as well.

Sry for the delay. I got distracted by work

Anyway here is some more info on the issue. I tested it a couple of times with different budgets and vessel costs. The effect remains the same. You simply get the funds that were saved by the "agressive negotiations" strategy for free if you recover on the launchpad. It still costs you rep.

Some pics:

building a rocket

on the launch pad. rocket bought at the reduced price

and here is the issue. I get more for the recovery than it cost me in the first place

the picked strategy and effects in numbers

to summarise the exploit:

I payd 25.411 funds on the rocket

I recovered 27.250 funds from the very same vessel

I have a surplus of 1.839 funds and lost 27 reputation

-> I get 6,75% of what the vessel costs

The problem: the saved funds are not a fixed number. It is relative to what the rocket costs and you can push that to huge numbers while the reputaion you have to pay stays the same. The payoff increases with the vessels size. Since you dont launch the vessel anyway, you can simply slap as many science labs together as you can affort and get your 6,75% or even more if you increase comitment

Hope that shows what I mean
